item.description:
Joe Craft, CPA - Don't Pay More Taxes Than You Have To!

Joe Craft, CPA/PFS, CFP will speak about the tax implications of real estate investing. He will cover topics such as:

1. How to own real estate and maximize tax benefits;
2. Tax advantages of seeking investor status in real estate transactions;
3. Dealer status and how it is taxed differently; and,
4. Using cost-segregation to lower your tax liability.

Monthly Meeting
6:30 PM, Thursday, January 20, 2011

Doubletree, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston, MA

free for members; only $25 for nonmembers

free parking

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
